title: PPP chief expresses deep sorrow over death of Agha Siraj Durrani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP):Chairman Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Bilawal Bhutto Zardari has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of senior politician and former Speaker of Sindh Assembly, Agha Siraj Durrani.
In his condolence message, Bilawal Bhutto paid rich tribute to Agha Siraj Durrani for his lifelong political and public service, saying that his contributions to democracy will always be remembered.
“Agha Siraj Durrani was a symbol of tolerance and patience. His passing marks the end of an era,” the Chairman said.
Bilawal Bhutto offered prayers for the departed soul and extended heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family, praying for patience and strength for them to bear this irreparable loss.
